headline: 3M Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The 3M Board of Directors (NYSE:MMM) today declared a dividend on the company's common stock of $0.73 per share for the third quarter of 2025. The dividend is payable Sept. 12, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on Aug. 25, 2025.
